Class ImageProcess

java.lang.Object
com.mycompany.imagej.ImageProcess
public class ImageProcess extends Object
Class with the Background Removal computation methods.

    • randomizedSVD

      public static ArrayList<org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F> randomizedSVD(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F A, int k)
      Method that does the SVD computation randomly, to gain in performance.
      Parameters:
      A - Matrix to apply the SVD
      k - Number of biggest first singular values
      Returns:
      U, S and V matrix after the SVD computation.

    • threshold

      Parameters:
      data - Matrix to apply the threshold
      tau -
      mode -
      Returns:
      Matrix with the applied threshold
